title: These Top Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 Deals Slash the Price of This Folding Handset
description: With discounts and trade‑in promos stacking up, you can bend the price offer down by as much as $1,200.
content: While the new Galaxy Z Fold 7 is our top pick for the overall best foldable phone this year, that doesn’t take away from the Galaxy Z Fold 6. This phone is still an excellent option for many, with pl… [+2090 chars]
